resources.string: Install the application through the Package Installer.
An update is available. Please update the application in the settings (click on the three points in the upper left corner of the screen -> Settings)
The minimum value must be greater than the minimum Integer value (-2,147,483,648).
Would you like to go out?
Would you like to download and install the update? If not, you can upgrade at a convenient time in the settings (three points from the top left -> Settings)
Do not remind for this version
This application is created entirely by one person. His name is Max Savitsky(It\'s me). All systems, all core, everything is done by me.
Do you really want to clear the history?
An update is available for testers. Would you like to download?

Do not want to join the team of application testers? You will receive new versions in which only error information will be collected. You can cancel the receipt of assemblies at any time in the settings.

Are you sure you want to stop receiving test builds? The version will remain the same with the next release of the stable version. You will return to the stable update branch. To become a tester again, press and hold the button to go to the site in the settings and a notification appears that you can join the team again.
An update is available for testers
Please do not erase the recorded information in the message. It is very important for us to understand where we look for a mistake (you can describe it in more detail)
The last result will be saved after closing the application.
The last result will not be saved after closing the application.
The update is available for installation. Install?
We will start downloading the update in the background. You can continue to use the application. Please do not close it.
Select the location of the button to display the settings, history, etc.
New MCalc is updating. Do you want to stop it and close?
